name: Lumina Machine
description:
Demo for a VR game that I'm working on for Oculus Quest 2.  I'm exploring the synesthesia effect i.e. music and visuals be synchronized. The game is a trippy free-flying shooter that creates procedural music and visual effects when you shoot at different objects.

NOTE: this is a very early stage, i.e. not much to do at the moment, it's a tech DEMO!

Controls:

  • Move: Use the RIGHT stick to free-fly forward where you are looking at.
  • Turn: Use the LEFT stick to turn left or right.
  • Shoot: Hold the RIGHT TRIGGER to Lock-ON object and release it to shoot.
  • Press BUTTON A to reset the music
  • Press BUTTON B to reset the level

How to install:

Use SideQuest to install the APK file on your device. You need to have the Dev Mode enabled on your Oculus Quest to have it work. When it's installed, check for Lumina Machine in the Unknow Sources of your apps.
